mutants.code:
def min_colors_to_paint(arr):
    arr.sort()
    count = 1
    while len(arr) != 0:
        ele1 = arr[0]
        brr = arr[1:]
        temp = 0
        for i in range(len(brr)):
            if brr[i] % ele1 == 0:
                temp = 1
                arr.remove(brr[i])
        count += 1
        arr.remove(ele1)
    return count
